snippet.title: Union Drive Trailer - English
snippet.description:
Union Drive is a short visual novel about workplace unionization. You'll step into the shoes of a young supermarket worker trying to strengthen the union at their place of work and fight against unjust working conditions. Throughout the game you’ll get to know your coworkers and their stories, and you’ll learn organization skills used by real-world union organizers.

You can play Union Drive on your computer or smartphone browswer by visiting: https://uniondrive.itch.io/union-drive

Union Drive is a joint project of Global Labor Justice-International Labor Rights Forum, a strategy hub supporting transnational collaboration among worker and migrant organizations, and UNI Américas, a branch of UNI Global Union that represents four million service sector union affiliates in the Americas.

The game was co-conceptualized and developed by Matajuegos, a Latin American videogame coop devoted to exploring games as a means of culture, politics, and society. The game was built with the open source visual novel engine, RenJS, developed by Luna Nemo.

Are you interested in learning more about labor organizing? Do you want to plan a training workshop within your organization that expands on this game? Contact us at uniondrivegame@gmail.com.

Union Drive Trailer in Spanish: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=U1Vloci1YHs

Global Labor Justice-International Labor Rights Forum: https://globallaborjustice.org/mission/

UNI Américas: https://uniglobalunion.org/es/regions/uni-americas/sobre-nosotros

UNI Global Union: https://uniglobalunion.org/

Matajuegos: https://www.mata.juegos/

RenJS: http://renjs.net/
